name: backlog-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for interacting with the Backlog API. This server provides tools for managing projects, issues, wiki pages, and more in Backlog through AI agents.

BACKLOG_API_KEY.title: Backlog API Key
BACKLOG_API_KEY.description: Your Backlog API key. Generate one from https://your-domain.backlog.com/EditApiSettings.action

tools.name: project_management
tools.description: Create, read, update, and delete Backlog projects

tools.name: issue_tracking
tools.description: Manage issues and comments in Backlog

tools.name: git_repositories
tools.description: Access git repositories and pull requests
